title: Federal Judge Decides BP Acted With Gross Negligence In Gulf Oil Spill
teaser: A federal judge has ruled that British Petroleum is guilty of gross negligence in the 2010 Deepwater Horizon oil rig explosion and oil spill. The decision means BP might be fined billions of dollars in penalties for its role.
